Question: You're one step away from reaching the next level in an online game. What do you believe would accelerate your progress towards that goal?
Achiever: Pursue higher leaderboard rankings for better rewards
Explorer: Venture into a new map in the game
Socializer: Collaborate with fellow players to form a team
Influencer: Broadcast my gameplay online to receive more points

Question: What approach would you consider to earn a free smartwatch from the fitness program organized by your community?
Achiever: Engage in daily workouts to advance in the fitness program
Explorer: Learn how the fitness program policy works
Socializer: Become involved in the fitness community by joining various classes
Influencer: Invite my friends to join the fitness program

Question: Your favorite restaurant is offering a giveaway , which of the following activities would you be willing to do in order to receive the giveaway?
Explorer: Try different dishes on the seasonal menu
Socializer: Bring a friend to dine in together
Influencer: Rate and review the food online

Question: When playing Monopoly with your friends, which of the following options best describes your strategy?
Achiever: Dominate the board by buying a majority of the properties
Explorer: Thoroughly learn the game rules before playing
Socializer: Cooperate with other players as much as possible
Influencer: Convince other players to adopt new rules for the game

Question: You participate in a contest to win a pair of concert tickets featuring your favorite band, what are you willing to do to win the tickets?
Achiever: Win eligibility from the band's loyalty quiz
Explorer: Listen to a designated new music genre for 1 week
Socializer: Attend the band’s meet and greet event
Influencer: Share organizer’s post on your social media and tag 3 friends under the comment section

Question: When engaging in a new game for the very first time, which of the following options best reflects your approach to playing?
Achiever: I aim to rapidly improve my skills in the game
Explorer: I initiate the game without instructions
Socializer: I befriend experienced players to learn and make connections
Influencer: I enjoy expressing my initial thoughts and reactions of the game online

Question: When looking for a credit card, which of the following factors holds the highest importance to you?
Achiever: Advance analytics tool to keep track of my spending
Explorer: Constantly updated benefits and offers from brand partners
Socializer: Ability to add someone to my account
Influencer: High reward points when referring friends

Question: When coordinating an event, what approach would you consider as your most effective plan of action?
Achiever: Create a plan to ensure each task is completed on time
Explorer: Brainstorm fun activities to captivate and involve the guests during the event
Socializer: Verbally advertise the event to my friends to generate interest and participation
Influencer: Utilize online advertising methods to promote the event and increase its visibility

Question: Which of the following options would you choose when purchasing your favorite latest phone?
Least risk averse: Pay full amount to purchase the phone
More risk averse: Plan the monthly payment with your credit card with potential interest rate
Most risk averse: Commit a mobile plan for 3 years with zero down payment for the phone

Question: You just spent $80 on a buffet dinner and they gave you a 30-day voucher. What voucher option would motivate you to revisit the restaurant?
Most susceptible: One free cocktail from a top class bartender
More susceptible: Get 15% off an afternoon tea & pastries combo for minimum of 2 people
Less susceptible: Get $30 off the total bill with a minimum of 3 people at the table
